synopsis: Xiaoyu and his friends finally became totem warriors. In order to fight against the evil Jiuli tribe, the young totem warriors went out to practice, looking for their own spirit beasts. Jiuli intends to encroach on the mysterious Gu Baolong's heart, and wants to resurrect the evil god Chi You. The Warrior Tower fought back, but Gun and others from unknown sources also fought with ulterior motives. Mengdan Lake is surging.
